_idio.StaticOptions.description: The top-level options when setting up the static middleware.

_idio.KoaStaticConfig.description: The configuration that is passed to koa-session.

_idio.SetHeaders.description: The function which allows to set the headers prior to sending the response.

_idio.Context.description: The extension to the standard Goa context with properties set by middleware.

_idio.Session.description: The session instance accessible via Goa's context.

_idio.Middleware.description: The function to handle requests which can be installed with the `.use` method.
